title: Goliath Beetles: Giant Insects
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,074 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 1010L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and Y
description: Goliath Beetles: Giant Insects is full of interesting facts and vibrant images that show why these beetles are such amazing animals. Students will enjoy exploring the life cycle and incredible appearance of these giant insects.
